author: A Google User
comment: Weather widget doesn't update automatically anymore

author: MOHAMMED ALMARZOUQI
comment: Weather is not displaying just shows -C

author: wtf gogle
comment: This app is great, but what would make it perfect is the option to make display "date" into numbers *IE 1/15/18 or a combo display like: Mon 1-15-2018 this could be a simple update that would make the watch app one of the best in the market! Pls add this feature! PLEASE!!

author: Danny Kirk
comment: Originally I was a fan of Morphing Watch Face. Now that we are using Android Wear 2 I am disappointed in this watch face. My main problem is when I click on the steps it will go to google fit and show me the actual true steps but the watch face still shows the incorrect steps.
Love it!

author: Andrea Pandolfo Damiani
comment: EDIT: 3 stars were indeed a bit unfair of me, it is still the best whatch face I managed to found around.  Simple and essential watch face, could be perfect for those who want a no-frills, yet customizable, watchface. I say "could", because the the watch face has the annoying habit of inadvertently entering the settings (a long press anywhere on the screen is enough, with no "lock" system EDIT: this is apparently the default beahviour for all watch faces - but then thema should introduce some other option for of locking the colour schemes and the settings.). , so when i carry my watch around I often find myself with all my colour schemes and complications randomly modified...

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. The long press is handled by the Android Wear OS directly, and not by the watch face. There is nothing I can do. The same will be with any watch face that includes wear settings unfortunately. Your rating is a bit unfair, you should blame the Android Wear app in the play store, not this one :(

author: Erik Diamond
comment: Fantastically easy to customize and looks great as well. A great watchface for those looking to have numerous interactive features with a clean, colourful look. Well worth 99¢.

author: Allen Isbell
comment: I love this face! No other compares to the simplicity and elegance.   *UPDATE* I had to uninstall the watch face from my watch AND my phone in order for it to work again after the Android Wear 2.0 update. Also, the watch application is run through the Android Wear app unlike before when it had its own application.   The dev team contacted me immediately to help me resolve my issues.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi,

Did you install the watch face on both watch & mobile?
Android Wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically from mobile to watch(a lot of users blame Google for that...). You have to do this manually, by going in the Google Play Store of both devices.
If the installation is not the issue, please send me an email to thema.apps@gmail.com

author: Kenny G
comment: After upgrading phones, I was unable to find the Morph app in my Android device or on my Moto 360. After writing a review I was giving guidance from the developers on how to correct the issue. This is a good app with good support.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch?

author: David Young
comment: Looks great, quite a few options, and very functional. One improvement I'd like to see involves the countdown for the next agenda item; displaying both the hours and minutes takes up too much real estate. Given the space available, I think it would be better if say for example 10 hours and 30 minutes were displayed as 10.5 hours.

author: Joseph Massimino
comment: Can't find it after installing, all I can do is update it, and uninstall it. I want my money back, but have no idea of how to contact anyone  I have a Samsung Gear 2 watch.  The app appears in installed apps, and I can upgrade it from there, or remove it, but I can't find it in the ful app list in my phone.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. What is your watch device? Does it run Android Wear 2 or 1.5? Can you send me an email with some details to thema.apps@gmail.com?
EDIT: Gear S2 is not an Android Wear watch device. This app is not compatible with your watch. The good store is the Samsung Galaxy Apps store, not Google Play: nothing compatible. Send me your order number to refund

author: Terri Gocha-Kramer
comment: Love this watch face! Works great on Fossil Q.  Does everything I need it to do and it is not complicated at all.

author: Martin Plamondon
comment: At first it wouldn't come up on my watch (zenwatch2). Emailed dev and within an hour dev had uploaded a new version to playstore. Did the update and works like a charm. Love it!

author: James Sivertson
comment: Love how simple thus app is and how customizable it is with the change of colors on your smartwatch face

author: Jesse Hurt
comment: Nice and simple, good options.

author: marc mulhuijzen
comment: Great watchface for my Fossil

author: ERIC JENKINS
comment: Work's great.... love it

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch?

author: Steven Paris
comment: I love this watch face.  I am using it on a Huawei and everything is working fine.

author: Scott Sanders
comment: Kept crashing.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you send me an email with some details to thema.apps@gmail.com? I'll be happy to help you.

author: Noah Passalacqua
comment: I really do like this watch face, but for some reason the "morphing" part (aka the 'wave' that moves) doesn't stay on the screen. After awhile, it just animates right off the screen, making it really hard to read what the complications and battery say... very fustrating

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you please send me a picture and some details about  your watch by email at thema.apps@gmail.com? I'll be happy to help you. EDIT: It will help a lot

author: Jason Newman
comment: Setting the AW2 complication to "Android pay" crashes the watch face. Also you cannot select 60 minutes heartbeat refresh from the phone, but you can on the watch (Huawei 2 Classic)

author: Ryan Marshall
comment: I would give five stars but I have no idea how to reset the custom complications after they have been set the first time. Amazing app just a little more info on how to use it would be much appreciated 😃

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi,

You can only modify the complication value by using the watch face settings available directly on the watch.
Long press the screen, hit the gear icon and go in the widgets settings. Choose your widget, and if you select (or already have selected) the "complication" data, a "define" button will be available below.

author: Jason Kaufman
comment: The numbers are big enough, the customizability is great and if a notification comes in, none of the screen elements get in the way of each other WITH ONE EXCEPTION. If you have the battery the battery icon set to on in Ambient mode and you get a notification, the two elements will clash making it hard to read. It's a good thing one or the other can be turned off to avoid this problem. I wish there were some sort of feature that could hide the battery while a notification is up, but this isn't a deal breaker for me. While this Morphing theme doesn't have the awesomeness and animations of the Tron-styled Vector theme, it's simple and gets the job done while still being nice to look at.

author: michelle daniels
comment: Did not open.  What's the deal?

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi,

Did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch?
You must install it on both device. Android wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically as Android wear 1.5 did.

author: Greg Ranse
comment: Great

author: Kelly DeCorso
comment: Look and function of watch face is good.  Customer service is awesome!  I had an issue with opening the companion phone app, and they helped me through my misunderstanding until it was solved.

author: Vaibhav Agrawal
comment: When I bought this app, I thought it offers excellent pre-defined color combinations for the watch face, but it is not there. It is difficult to come up with nice color combination. I would like my money refunded for this app.

author: Livanny Rivera
comment: Tried download, uninstalling, then installing again. App wouldn't launch. Pretty disappointed.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. what is your watch device? can you give me more details by email at thema.apps@gmail.com, I'll be happy to help you

author: Adrian Tamez
comment: Ok face watch but no response from developer at all. It's been more than 2 weeks now with no response.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. I did answer you 2 weeks ago, maybe the email was filtered in your spam box. The battery indicator is intended to be static and not customized. It is part of the design, and also to prevent too many battery usage for people who would set too many external data. You can set the mobile battery in one of the 3 available area.

author: Carl W
comment: I like this watch face a lot. The settings are nice and useful. The watch face shows everything that I need to know.

author: Chad Monroe
comment: My go to watchface.

author: K.C. Anderson
comment: Great watch face highly enjoy it.

author: Dheepak Rajendran
comment: It's good, but theming options for fonts on screen, icon themes on widgets will make it 5*

author: Shelby McGregor
comment: I have a Asus ZenWatch 2 and I have been having a hard time finding a good square watch face that makes good use of the form factor.  I wanted a watch face that can report my phone and watch battery life, weather, and Google fit steps.  I tried a couple facer faces that seemed to slow down the watch and burn through battery.  This face seems to be battery friendly, displays clearly all of the data I want while the watch performance is not sluggish at all.  Overall my favorite watch face.
title: Works great

author: Chris Harrington
comment: 15 minutes with it and things seem to work alright with my original Moto 360.
title: Good so far

author: Bobby Cook
comment: Just what I've been looking for. You can access other apps quickly and change with ease the apps you want to display.
title: Awesome

author: Jason Hartwell
comment: Clean look with great customization and useful widgets. Makes my smartwatch all the better.

author: Tyler Brayton
comment: Works well on fossil watch. Awesome color options.
title: Great on fossil q founder

author: Jonathan Kloepping
comment: It's awesome
title: Kicks butt

author: Kelly Courtney
comment: Great app for Asus watch..works great..
title: Kelly lg 5
